message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.GT, cs.CR, cs.SY

The paper deals with security threats in IoT systems, specifically jamming attacks, and proposes a game-theoretic approach to mitigate these attacks. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.IT (Information Theory) which deals with the transmission, processing, and utilization of information. The paper also deals with network layer attacks, which suggests the category cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) as the second most likely category. The use of game theory in the proposed approach suggests the category cs.GT (Computer Science and Game Theory) as the third most likely category. The paper also deals with security threats, which suggests the category cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) as the fourth most likely category. Finally, the use of an evolutionary algorithm to solve the game suggests the category cs.SY (Systems and Control) as the fifth most likely category.
